content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Maryam Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello Maryam, it's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you'll find this apartment to be a perfect fit for your needs. How much were you thinking of offering for the monthly rent?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Well, I am a student and I am on a tight budget. I was thinking about 400 euros per month. It would be a great help if you could consider this offer.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I understand that you're a student and might have a limited budget, but the price you're offering is quite low for an apartment of this size and location. The apartment is brand new and in the heart of the city, close to all amenities. I'm sure you'll find it very convenient. Would you be willing to make a higher offer?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your point, but I have to be honest with you. I have a fixed budget and I can't afford to pay more than 450 euros per month. I hope you understand my situation.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Maryam, I appreciate your honesty. 450 euros is still below my expectations, but considering your situation as a student, I might be able to work with that. However, I would like to offer you a six-month lease with the option to review the rent at the end of the term. Would that be acceptable to you?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That sounds like a reasonable proposal. I agree to the price of 450 euros per month. However, I would like a twelve-month lease. Is that possible?
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I'm glad to hear that you're willing to commit to a longer lease. A twelve-month lease is certainly possible. I agree to the price of 450 euros per month for a twelve-month lease. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
